meanings.definition: Incapable of being imagined or considered
meanings.sent1: The idea of flying without wings is truly unthinkable.
meanings.sent2: It is unthinkable to believe that pigs can fly.
meanings.sent3: It would be unthinkable to see a fish riding a bicycle.
meanings.sent4: Her success was as unthinkable as a cat playing the piano.
meanings.sent5: The thought of a talking tree is simply unthinkable.

meanings.definition: Beyond the limits of what is possible or acceptable
meanings.sent1: The cost of the luxury car was unthinkable for most people.
meanings.sent2: It is unthinkable to wear pajamas to a formal event.
meanings.sent3: It would be unthinkable to eat ice cream in the middle of winter.
meanings.sent4: The distance she traveled on foot was as unthinkable as crossing an ocean.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a square-shaped planet is truly unthinkable.
